summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PBX Phase 0 Cleanup. All key features verified: Onboarding Step 4 shows PBX Friends as primary option with RECOMMENDED badge, Send page is external-only (GCash, Maya, Bank, Cash), 6-tab navigation works correctly, Home page 'Send PBX' navigates to /sender/people, Profile Switcher works, and socialApi.js includes X-Active-Profile header.

onboarding_step_4.RECOMMENDED badge: PASS - Badge visible on PBX Friends CTA
onboarding_step_4.PBX Wallet removed: PASS - PBX Wallet option correctly removed (moved to Chat)
onboarding_step_4.External payee divider: PASS - 'or add external payee' divider visible
onboarding_step_4.Page title: PASS - 'Add your first friend or payee' visible

send_page_external_only.Send to External header: PASS - Header shows 'Send to External' with 'GCash, Maya, Bank, Cash'
send_page_external_only.PBX Friends tip banner: PASS - 'Sending to a PBX user? Go to People tab for instant, free transfers →'
send_page_external_only.PBX Wallet removed: PASS - No PBX Wallet option on Send page
send_page_external_only.Tip banner navigation: PASS - Clicking tip banner navigates to /sender/people

six_tab_navigation.Mobile bottom nav: PASS - All 6 tabs visible in mobile view

home_page_send_pbx_button.Send PBX button: PASS - Button found with 'To friends' subtitle

profile_switcher.Active Profile section: PASS - Shows 'ACTIVE PROFILE' with current user
profile_switcher.Add Business Profile option: PASS - '+ Add Business Profile' option visible

social_api_header.X-Active-Profile header: PASS - socialApi.js includes X-Active-Profile header in getHeaders() function (line 24)

critical_code_review_comments: All Phase 0 Cleanup features implemented correctly
PBX→PBX transfers moved to Chat (social flow) - Send page is external-only
Onboarding Step 4 shows PBX Friends as RECOMMENDED primary option
6-tab navigation: Home, Send, People, Businesses, Activity, Settings
Home page 'Send PBX' button correctly navigates to /sender/people
socialApi.js includes X-Active-Profile header in all API requests
MagicLinkHandler implements correct deep link routing for all notification types
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
test_credentials: Session set via localStorage for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 0 Cleanup fully tested. Key changes: (1) Onboarding Step 4 shows PBX Friends CTA with RECOMMENDED badge as primary option, external payees (GCash, Maya, Bank, Cash) as secondary, (2) Send page (/sender/send) is external-only with tip banner linking to People tab, (3) Home page 'Send PBX' button navigates to /sender/people, (4) 6-tab navigation: Home, Send, People, Businesses, Activity, Settings, (5) socialApi.js includes X-Active-Profile header, (6) MagicLinkHandler implements deep link routing for pbx_transfer, friend_request, business_payment, external_payout.
